text:
I have loaded both the Mandrake 10.2 and SuSE9.3 linux distros of the latest
apache on a Gigabyte board with amd64 and sata drive. The 64 bit code version
does not appear to work correctly. Apache works OK as local host but freezes the
machine when an external request from the web comes in. It will only load the
index page then locks up.

Any help would be appreciated. I have no problem with the hardware on earlier
versions of apache ie mandrake 10.1 and Suse 9.1. All I can assume is that the
apache 64 bit code version has a problem
creator: bscho@lioncom.net

text:
Sounds like a kernel or hardware issue, try
http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html or a Mandrake/SuSE forum as appropriate.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
